content: As you clear a path through the room, keep an eye on the wall to the right, and you should find a group of hanging cocoons blocking a small alcove. Inside, you'll find a **Treasure Chest** with random materials, but also a Beetle Captain that will burst out of a nearby cocoon!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Upper Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Pool of Shattered Jade'.
The content is as follows:
As you clear a path through the room, keep an eye on the wall to the right, and you should find a group of hanging cocoons blocking a small alcove. Inside, you'll find a **Treasure Chest** with random materials, but also a Beetle Captain that will burst out of a nearby cocoon!
